headline.main: Ukraine and Russia Face Off in U.N. Court Over Separatist Conflict
headline.print_headline: Ukraine and Russia Face Off in U.N. Court Over Separatist Conflict

lead_paragraph: Tensions between Ukraine and Russia will play out at the U.N.'s highest court on Monday when judges begin hearing Kiev's request to order Moscow to halt support for pro-Russian separatists.
snippet: Tensions between Ukraine and Russia will play out at the U.N.'s highest court on Monday when judges begin hearing Kiev's request to order Moscow to halt support for pro-Russian separatists....
